channel.title: Quick question
channel.description:
So ive been adding monsters for the past 3 hours and just got a little curious about the last number on the code for the monster. The code looks like this [code]npc = 55 Blue_dragon 111 6000 300[/code] I know that the first number is the cb level. The second number is the hp. But what is the 3rd number that only applies to some monsterS?
Also, i was wondering how to change a monsters max hit, cause most of the monsters i have added in are just hitting 0s with the exception of 1 or 2
Thanks, t00---fast1

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @Owner_of_Flamescape Owner of Flamescape
item.description:
@Owner_of_Flamescape wrote:

do you know how to change what they hit?

Read full topic

I know that the first number is the cb level.

Also, i was wondering how to change a monsters max hit, cause most of the monsters i have added in are just hitting 0s with the exception of 1 or 2
